Airport Observations ✈️

Airports are strange places. They’re a mix of chaos and order, full of stories colliding in real time hellos, goodbyes, nerves, excitement, and a surprising amount of people-watching material. While waiting for my flight, I found myself observing the little dramas, habits, and quirks unfolding around me. What I saw was a snapshot of humanity, all compressed into a single terminal.

  • Probably the highest density of cute and fashionable people here.
  • Class divide: economy vs business, priority vs normal boarding.

  • Emotions:

    • People meeting family after long.
    • People leaving family for long.
  • People pretending to work on their laptops.
  • People actually working on their laptops because there is no life.
  • People working from home but traveling without telling their team — they’ll be AFK.
  • Nervous people traveling for the first time and happy people traveling for the first time.
  • Middle-class kids feeling proud taking their parents on a plane for the first time.
  • People walking around trying to be cooler than they are.
  • Many wondering whether to spend on that expensive coffee or not.
  • Looking at people’s luggage, you might guess their net worth (or not) and wonder what you are doing wrong with your life.
  • Kids crying at the airport and in the flight.
  • Most are sleep deprived.
  • Uncles watching videos on mobile loudly without earphones.
  • Cool people traveling for business purposes only with just a laptop bag.
  • A young married couple being all cute, probably going on their honeymoon.
  • Confused foreigners.
  • That aunty talking loudly, telling her family she’s going to board now.
  • A young couple with a baby, who themselves look like babies.
  • All those 10/10s whom you will never see/meet again in life.

  • And at last, Me:

    • Chose to board the flight instead of approaching that cute girl.
    • Flying economy, normal boarding.
    • Didn’t stand in the queue, sat nicely & waited for the queue to end.

Going to board now. AMA.

frontmatter.title: Order In Chaos At An Airport
frontmatter.description: A collection of raw, funny, and emotional observations while people-watching at an airport.
